text: If you loved someone, you loved him, and when you had nothing else to give, you still gave him love
author: George Orwell

text: When you have something to say, silence is a lie.
author: Jordan Peterson

text: Suffering is the true test of life
author: David Goggins

text: If you ever start taking things too seriously, just remember that we are talking monkeys on an organic spaceship flying through the universe
author: Joe Rogan
